en.title_aboutMe_text: I‚Äôm a multidisciplinary visual artist with a deep passion for animation, digital storytelling, and creative web design. From character animation to motion graphics and HTML/CSS websites, I blend technical skill with artistic sensitivity to bring ideas to life. I have experience working across several creative fields ‚Äî from 2D short films and web content to branding and audio-visual production. I enjoy styles that feel raw, honest, almost childlike ‚Äî where hand-drawn textures, cutout animation, and imperfections bring charm and emotion to every frame. Tools I work with daily include Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects, Premiere Pro, and HTML/CSS. I‚Äôve also collaborated on sound editing, storytelling, and graphic design pieces for various projects. My current focus is on building a career that bridges visual expression and storytelling, particularly inspired by the Scandinavian animation scene. Always open to new creative collaborations ‚Äî feel free to reach out or explore some of my work below.
